verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] donating his first quarter salary to the Department of Veterans Affairs , as his search continues for a nominee to lead the agency .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: donating] [ARG1: his first quarter salary] [ARG2: to the Department of Veterans Affairs] , [ARGM-TMP: as his search continues for a nominee to lead the agency] .
President Donald Trump is donating his first quarter salary to the Department of Veterans Affairs , as [ARG1: his search] [V: continues] [C-ARG1: for a nominee to lead the agency] .
President Donald Trump is donating his first quarter salary to the Department of Veterans Affairs , as his search continues for [ARG0: a nominee] to [V: lead] [ARG1: the agency] .
